Logistic Regression Coef (z Test)

zlogreg.Rd

Logistic Regression Coef (z Test)

Usage

zlogreg(
  calculate = "selectpower",
  typeinput = "prob",
  p0 = 0.5,
  p1 = 0.4,
  oddsratio = 0.67,
  beta1 = 0.25,
  beta0 = 0,
  r2otherx = 0,
  power = 0.8,
  alpha = 0.05,
  alternative = "not equal",
  distribution = "normal",
  mean = 0,
  sd = 1,
  min = 0,
  max = 1,
  size = 1,
  prob = 0.5,
  meanlog = 0,
  sdlog = 1,
  lambda = 1,
  rate = 1,
  n = 200
)

results$text2a preformatted
